msg: Congratulations! Now you have a bit more life on your island. May your journey continue to be filled with success, excitement, and ever-greener landscape!
You have a change! Your grass started breathing as you are doing this great job. Enjoy the vibrant challenges that lie ahead!
That's wonderful! Your island is greener again. Keep going!
Congratulations! As you've reached the new level now life on your island is truly blossoming!
It's unbelievable! With each step you take, you grow greener and your land is flourishing. May your gaming journey continue to bloom!
